title: Unexpected mutations occurred in CRISPR/Cas9 edited Drosophila analyzed by deeply whole genomic sequencing

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Zhu Xiao, Wu Ying, Zhang Xing, Li Zhihui, Zhang Qiuyu, Hu Caijiao, Li Changlong, Hanping Shi, Li Deng, Chen Zhenwen, Ni Jianquan, Huo Xueyun, Du Xiaoyan
